bike.description: S-Works Enduro FACT 10m carbon main triangle, Az1 construction, M5 rear triangle, full cartridge bearing pivots, 150mm travel

components.description: Specialized AFR Shock w/ Spike valve, air spring, adjustable rebound and low speed compression, 7.875x2.25"
S-Works Future Shock e150SL, lightweight machined dual crown w/ integrated stem, 150mm travel, rebound, compresion and travel adjust, 25mm thru axle, lightweight machined alloy steerer.
1 1/8" threadless, Campy spec integrated sealed cartridge bearing
Shimano M970 XTR, DMD top swing
Alloy collar w/ QR, 36.9mm clamp ID, for carbon frames
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
